root: ^I'm at %FullName:NPC:1%'s place and drop food on the crotch of my pants.
^The dog comes over and starts licking it. What do I do?
^Do nothing, the dog will finish soon.

res1: ^%FullName:NPC:1% sees me letting the dog do this and thinks I'm a weirdo and kicks me out.

^Not only does %FullName:NPC:1% think I am weird and kicks me out, but %Pron:1:1% tells a bunch of our mutual friends so now everyone thinks I'm a freak. I was just trying to let the dog finish and hoping it would eventually stop!
res2: ^The dog keeps following me and eventually %FullName:NPC:1% realizes what's going on and gets the dog for me.
^%FullName:NPC:1% finds the whole thing funny and eventually helps me get the dog away. %Pron:1:1% gets me something to clean my pants and we have a laugh over the whole thing.
res3: ^%FullName:NPC:1% gets mad at me for pushing %Pron:1:2% dog like I do.

^%FullName:NPC:1% gets mad at me because it looks like I'm just pushing the dog. %Pron:1:1% actually slaps me in the face and gives me a bruise. I explain what happened but just end up leaving. This was too much for me.
global decl: ^The dog comes over and starts licking it. What do I do?
